short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InSave is a chrome extension that adds a button to Instagram posts and stories that allows downloading images and videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download your favorite images and videos.

Itâ€™s easier than ever to download the images and video you like from Instagram web version with the InSave chrome extension button. With just one click, you can have favorite images and videos.

Here's how InSave button works:

- Navigate to www.instagram.com
- Open desired post
- Click the InSave button in the bottom right corner

What it can do:
- Download images and videos from posts

New features:
- Upload images and videos from stories

Hint:
If you opened a post and you don't see InSave button, just refresh the page - nobody's perfect:)))
